text: Vincent Arthur Maria van der Burg (17 April 1945 – 29 April 2020) was a Dutch lawyer and politician. Van der Burg was born in Zeist. He was a member of the KVP, later changed into CDA. He was a member of Dutch House of Representatives from 1979 to 1998 (with interruptions in 1981 and 1982). Van den Burg died in Zeist on 29 April 2020, aged 75.Oud-Tweede Kamerlid Vincent van der Burg uit Zeist overleden, RTV Utrecht, 2 May 2020.Oud-CDA-Tweede Kamerlid Vincent van der Burg overleden, Parlement.com, 2 May 2020. ==References== ==Other websites== *Biography at “parlement.com” Category:1945 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Catholic People's Party politicians Category:Christian Democratic Appeal politicians Category:Dutch lawyers Category:Dutch Roman Catholics Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:People from Zeist Category:Politicians from Utrecht (province)
title: Vincent van der Burg
